hero.title: What knowledge do you need during the keeping process?
hero.subtitle:
The following section compiles a range of educational materials in different formats. Some content is整理、整合并翻译自 multiple sources including books, websites, ratteries, and organizations such as Pet Rat Care, Isamu Rat Care, RatGuide, the American Fancy Rat & Mouse Association, the National Fancy Rat Society, The New Scuttling Gourmet, Once Upon a Mischief, and Rat Variety Guide.

Due to content integration and language adaptation, the final Chinese version also incorporates observations and perspectives drawn from my own experience and from various original sources. As a result, it is not always possible to precisely attribute individual passages within the text. Readers who wish to consult the original materials may find the corresponding source links listed at the end of each article.

items.text: The natural origin and development of the brown rat, and the significant contributions of laboratory rats to the history of human scientific research

items.text: How rats behave as a group in daily life, and what these behaviors may indicate
